column1: Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba!////Everybody rants and raves about this place and I don't seem to understand why. When I dined at Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba (dined-in twice to confirm)
column3: some of the warm plates were colder than expected
column4: and the overall quality of the food was "meh". This place seems to have a cult following and advertises all over the city. If you live in Chicago
column5: try it to say you tried it since one of your friends will eventually mention their "mind-blowing" experience at Cafe Ba-Ba-Reeba.
